entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is screaming again due to physical pain caused by the sound of her voice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is running around the cellar and feeling the walls for something, knowing it's useless.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is half sobbing and pounding the walls with his fists.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid's pouch is being used by Harry to find something.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's eye appears in the mirror fragment.

entities.name: malfoy manor
entities.description: The cellar is located at Malfoy Manor.

entities.name: dumbledore's snitch
entities.description: Harry pulls out Dumbledore's Snitch from Hagrid's pouch.

entities.name: phoenix wand
entities.description: The broken halves of the phoenix wand are waved by Harry.

entities.name: mirror fragment
entities.description: A mirror fragment falls sparkling to the floor.

relationships.description: Harry pulls out Dumbledore's Snitch from Hagrid's pouch.
The broken halves of the phoenix wand are waved by Harry.
Harry sees Dumbledore's eye in the mirror fragment.
The cellar is located at Malfoy Manor, which is associated with Dumbledore.
